content.story_intro: 1000-employee company, healthcare sector. No formal risk program. Build from scratch.

steps.title: Company Profile
steps.content: Healthcare tech company. 1000 employees. Revenue $200M. Products: EHR software (cloud SaaS), patient portal. Data: 500K patient PHI. Compliance: HIPAA mandatory.
steps.insight: Healthcare = high risk. PHI breach = $10M+ cost. HIPAA fines. Reputation damage. Risk program is critical.

steps.title: Your Mission
steps.content: Design: 1) Risk governance structure. 2) Risk assessment process. 3) Vulnerability management. 4) Third-party risk program. 5) BCP/DR. 6) Metrics & reporting. Budget: $2M/year.
steps.insight: Comprehensive risk program touches: governance, technical controls, processes, people, vendors, resilience.

unlock_content.title: Org Structure
points: CISO: Reports to CEO or CRO. NOT to CIO (conflict of interest).
GRC team: 1 Director, 2 risk analysts, 1 compliance analyst ($600K/year).
Risk committee: Quarterly. CISO, CFO, CTO, General Counsel, CEO.
Board reporting: Quarterly risk report to Board. Cyber risk = board-level.
Policies: Risk management policy, acceptable use, incident response.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: CISO reporting to CIO = problem. Budget/priority conflicts. CISO should be peer to CIO.

unlock_content.title: Assessment Cadence
points: Annual: Comprehensive risk assessment. All assets, threats, vulns.
Quarterly: Risk register review. Update statuses, new risks.
Ad-hoc: Trigger events (new system, M&A, major threat).
Methodology: NIST RMF. Categorize (High for PHI), Select controls, Assess.
Tools: GRC platform (ServiceNow GRC, RSA Archer). $150K/year.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Risk assessment WITHOUT remediation = waste. Must have accountability for risk treatment.

unlock_content.title: VM Program
points: Scanning: Tenable, Qualys. Weekly authenticated scans. $100K/year.
Prioritization: CVSS + exploitability + asset criticality.
SLA: Critical 7 days, High 30 days, Medium 90 days.
Exception process: Must document, approve, compensating controls.
Metrics: MTTP, vulnerability debt, SLA compliance.
Equifax lesson: VM program only works if enforced.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: MTTP is THE metric. Target: Critical <7 days. Track monthly. Executive visibility.

unlock_content.title: TPRM Program
points: Inventory: All vendors. Classify by criticality (access to PHI = critical).
Assessment: SIG questionnaire, SOC 2 review, security ratings.
Contracts: Security clauses (breach notification, audit rights, liability).
Monitoring: Annual re-assessment, continuous ratings (BitSight $50K/year).
Tools: OneTrust, ProcessUnity for vendor tracking. $100K/year.
Target lesson: Small vendor = big risk. Assess ALL.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Critical vendors: Annual on-site audit or third-party assessment. Don't just trust questionnaire.

unlock_content.title: Continuity Planning
points: BIA: Define RTOs/RPOs. EHR system = Tier 1 (RTO 4 hours).
Backups: 3-2-1 rule. Veeam backup solution $200K/year.
DR site: AWS multi-region for DR. Estimated $300K/year.
Testing: Annual full DR test. Quarterly tabletop.
Insurance: Cyber liability $10M coverage. $150K/year premium.
Colonial lesson: DR plan must be tested. Backups must work.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Cyber insurance: Requires MFA, EDR, backups, IR plan. Ensures baseline security.

unlock_content.title: Metrics Dashboard
points: Key metrics: MTTP, vulnerability debt, control effectiveness, incident count.
Executive dashboard: Real-time. Red/yellow/green status.
Quarterly board report: Risk trends, top risks, mitigation status.
Annual attestation: CEO/CISO sign attestation of risk program effectiveness.
Continuous improvement: Review metrics quarterly, adjust targets.
unlock_content.bonus_fact: Board wants: Are we secure? What are top risks? What's being done? Keep simple.

unlock_content.title: Cost Breakdown
points: People: GRC team $600K
Tools: GRC platform $150K, Scanner $100K, Vendor mgmt $100K, BitSight $50K
DR: AWS multi-region $300K, Veeam $200K
Cyber insurance: $150K
Training: Security awareness $100K, GRC certs $50K
Consulting: Annual risk assessment $150K
Misc/contingency: $200K
Total: $2M
unlock_content.bonus_fact: 30% people, 25% tools, 25% DR/insurance, 20% services/training. Typical distribution.
